full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
===========================

### Title

Supply and Install 3 Prefabricated Canvas Buildings at Valcartier Military Base

### Reference Number

WS3713861701-Doc4068633691

### Solicitation Number

WS3713861701

### Publication Date

July 5, 2023

### Tender Closing Date

August 16, 2023 at 14:00 (EDT)

### Background

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) to acquire 3 prefabricated canvas buildings, including delivery and installation, at the Valcartier Military Base in Québec, Canada.

### Requirements

*   3 prefabricated canvas buildings
*   Delivery and installation at the Valcartier Military Base in Québec, Canada

### Tendering Process

The tendering process will be conducted through the Ariba Discovery platform. Bid submission must be completed at least by 14:00 (EDT) on August 16, 2023.

### Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on price, with the lowest priced bid considered first.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity

This tender is open to contractors from Canada.

### Regions of Delivery

The project will be delivered in Valcartier, Québec, Canada.

### Contact Information

For further information or to obtain bid documents, kindly contact:

*   Julien Ratte (PSPC)
*   Email: [julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Phone: None
*   Fax: None

### Notice URL

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16779914?extsite=MTY3Nzk5MTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
